title: Curren Chain Steel Watch
description: Perfect and maximal dial with stainless steel for inspirable personalities.
details: Water-resistant up to 50m, quartz movement, 2-year warranty included.

title: Gold-Stainless Steel Watch
details: Elegant gold finish with date display and scratch-proof glass.

title: Square Dial Watch
description: Stylish and strong stainless steel watch for daily elegance.
details: Sapphire crystal glass with leather strap and luminous hands.

title: Pink Leather Watch
description: Simple dial with cute background and soft leather straps.
details: Perfect for casual wear, comes with 1 extra pink strap.

title: White Pearl Watch
description: White dial with pearl inset and white chain, fashionable design.
details: Crystal-lined rim, delicate casing, and minimalist face.

title: Simple Elegant Watch
description: Simple dark pink chain watch with decent dial.
details: Lightweight and elegant, includes matching bracelet.
